Why EcoMana?

Trusted Professionals

Our team consists of certified painters committed to delivering exceptional results you can trust.

Embracing Māori Values

We integrate Māori principles of Kaitiakitanga (guardianship) and Manaakitanga (hospitality) in all our projects.

Local to Tauranga

Proudly serving the Tauranga community with local expertise and a personal touch.

Reliable Service

Count on us for punctuality and professionalism from start to finish.

Eco-Friendly Practices

We use environmentally friendly paints and sustainable methods to protect our beautiful New Zealand.

Quality Workmanship

Delivering high-quality finishes that enhance and preserve your property's value.

Personalized Solutions

Tailoring our services to meet your unique needs and preferences.

Customer Satisfaction

Your happiness is our priority—we strive for excellence in every project.

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed and insured for your peace of mind and protection.

Our ways

At EcoMana, sustainability is more than a buzzword—it's the essence of our operations. We are dedicated to minimizing our environmental impact by using eco-friendly paints and sustainable materials. Our practices include responsible waste management, energy-efficient processes, and sourcing products from environmentally conscious suppliers. We believe in creating beautiful spaces while preserving the natural beauty of New Zealand for future generations.

Our Values

EcoMana proudly integrates Māori principles such as Kaitiakitanga (guardianship) and Manaakitanga (hospitality) into every project. Kaitiakitanga inspires us to protect and enhance the environment through our eco-friendly painting services. Manaakitanga drives us to foster genuine relationships with our clients, providing exceptional service with respect and warmth. By honoring these values, we deliver not just quality workmanship but also a deep commitment to community and culture.
